1.0.name: wordpress/add-font-family-dropdown-to-visual-editor
1.0.description:
This is a fairly basic plugin and adds a Font family dropdown for selecting fonts.

Visit Add Font Family Dropdown to Visual Editor Plugin Homepage for more information.

NOTE: This plugin also removes the "Paste as Plain Text", "Paste from Word" and "Remove formatting" button for neat layout of Visual Editor, though this is optional.

Contact Me if you will like to see any other feature on this plugin.
